article_title: COVID-19 critical care bed modelling study: potential shortage in Canada
article_description: A national modelling paper predicting the number of available ICU beds across Canada during the COVID 19 pandemic suggests that self isolation will likely not be enough to keep demand from exceeding supply  It is published in CMAJ  Canadian Medical Associatio
article_content: A national modelling paper predicting the number of available ICU beds across Canada during the COVID 19 pandemic suggests that self isolation will likely not be enough to keep demand from exceeding supply  It is published in CMAJ  Canadian Medical Associatio   2313 chars
